question: Evan delivers packages in a building. He started on the first floor and went up 7 floors. He went down 3 floors and then up 16 floors. Then he was only 2 floors away from the top of the building. How many floors are in the building altogether?
response:
Evan started on the first floor, and after going up 7 floors, he was on the 8th floor. Then, he went down 3 floors, making him on the 5th floor. After going up 16 floors, he was on the 21st floor. Finally, he was only 2 floors away from the top of the building, which means he was on the 23rd floor.

The answer is 23.
